parameters.name: AutoPay
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable automatic payment. Default value: true. Valid values:

*   **true**: enables automatic payment.
*   **false**: disables automatic payment. If automatic payment is disabled, you must perform the following steps to complete the payment in the ApsaraDB for Redis console: In the top navigation bar, choose **Expenses** > **Renewal Management**. In the left-side navigation pane, click **Orders**. On the **Orders** page, find the order and complete the payment.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~60933~~) operation to query the ID of the instance.

parameters.name: OrderTimeLength
parameters.description: The validity period of the bandwidth that you purchase. Unit: days. Valid values: **1**, **2**, **3**, **7**, **14**, **30**, **60**, **90**, **180**, **365**, **730**, **1095**, and **1825**.

parameters.name: SourceBiz
parameters.description: The source of the operation. This parameter is used only for internal maintenance. You do not need to specify this parameter.
